publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1180 Mr Tom McCabe on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Membership of Committeesâ€”That the Parliament agrees the following appointments to committees: Johann Lamont and Cathy Jamieson to be members of the Education Committee; Karen Whitefield to be a member of the Audit Committee; Kenneth Macintosh to be a member of the Subordinate Legislation Committee. Supported by: Iain Smith*
